description: This table contains audit information about the appointment-level info for imaging studies.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APPT_ITMS_ASNS
columns.description: Audit column for appointments' asn for an imaging procedure. The values are delimited by "^". The source item is located at ORDER_APPT_INFO.LINKED_APPOINTMENTS.
